TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE CARDINAL . She was represented before the ORG by Mr O. Choděra , a lawyer practising in GPE CARDINAL . The respondent Government were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicant lodged an action with the Prague ORG ( obvodní soud ) against a private entrepreneur , seeking the payment of CZK CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) . The action reached the court on DATE .
On DATE ORG invited the applicant to pay the court fees , which he did . The proof of this payment was notified to ORG on DATE .
On DATE the court requested an excerpt from ORG ( živnostenský rejstřík ) concerning the defendant 's business activities , which was submitted on DATE .
On DATE the applicant 's claim was sent to the defendant .

On DATE the Prague ORG found that the defendant had his permanent address within the GPE CARDINAL district and , on CARDINAL DATE , it transferred the action , for territorial reasons , to the GPE CARDINAL ORG .

By a payment order ( platební rozkaz ) of DATE , ORG ordered the defendant to pay the sum claimed by the applicant , including the default interest . According to the Government , the payment order was issued on DATE .
The defendant did not appeal and the order became effective on DATE .
On DATE the applicant requested the execution of the payment order by means of the sale of the defendant 's movable property . The applicant 's request was notified to ORG on DATE .

By letter of DATE , notified , according to the applicant , on DATE , ORG invited the applicant 's lawyer to submit his power of attorney and to pay the court fees . The power of attorney and proof of payment of the fees reached the court on CARDINAL and CARDINAL DATE respectively .

On DATE ORG ordered the execution of the payment order . On DATE the order was notified to the applicant 's lawyer who , on DATE , and upon ORG request , returned it for rectification of the date from which the default interest had to be paid to the applicant .
On DATE the applicant 's lawyer urged the court to continue with his client 's proceedings .
On DATE the court rectified the payment order which , on DATE , was served on the applicant .
On DATE , CARDINAL May and DATE a bailiff unsuccessfully attempted to serve the execution order on the defendant , and to draft a list of movable property belonging to him .
In the meantime , on DATE and DATE , the applicant 's lawyer had requested the court to enforce the execution order .

During the period from DATE to DATE , the defendant repeatedly attended ORG and paid the amount due in several instalments . On DATE ORG remitted the whole sum of CZK CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL ) to the applicant . In the meantime , on DATE , the bailiff had again unsuccessfully tried to contact the defendant at his permanent address .
On DATE ORG remitted the defendant 's outstanding payment of MONEY ( EUR CARDINAL ) to the applicant .
In his letter of CARDINAL DATE addressed to ORG , the applicant 's lawyer stated , without providing further details , that his client had received the totality of the amount due in DATE .
